network

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MsgAbort, MsgAck, MsgCancelNodeTransaction, MsgFileAck, MsgFileAdd, MsgFileOffer, MsgFileRemove, MsgFileRequest, MsgFileResultNotify, MsgFileWorkerChange, MsgGetToSameLevelFinished, MsgHello, MsgPromptToEnlightNode, MsgQuit, MsgReady, MsgStart, MsgSteady, MsgTransactionAlive

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provide methods to compose message, read and write strings.
    Author:
    Ivan Straka

      • getNodeID

        public abstract int getNodeID()
        Used for identification. i.e. in MsgHello message define sender id. Also, this may be used with getTransactionID() for unique command identification.
        Example: nodes A nad B
        A sends MsgFileRequest with A's id-2 and command id-3 to B.
        B sends MsgFileOffer with node id-2 and command id-3 to A.
        A successfuly downloads file and sends MsgAck with nodeID 2 and transactionID 3 to B to end transfering.
        B can map some object to 2=>3=>object to handle transfering.
        Returns:
        node id

      • getTransactionID

        public abstract int getTransactionID()
        Used for identification. i.e. in MsgHello message define sender id. Also, this may be used with getTransactionID() for unique transaction identification.
        Example: nodes A nad B
        A sends MsgFileRequest with A's id-2 and command id-3 to B.
        B sends MsgFileOffer with node id-2 and command id-3 to A.
        A successfuly downloads file and sends MsgAck with nodeID 2 and transactionID 3 to B to end transfering.
        B can map some object to 2=>3=>object to handle transfering.
        Returns:
        node id
